description.p: The baby dragon turtle can breathe air and water

sheet.description: The baby dragon turtle can breathe air and water

description.p: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + 4) piercing damage.

sheet.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +{{companion:attack}} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d4 + {{companion:damage}}) piercing damage.

description.p: The baby dragon turtle exhales scalding steam in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 4d6 fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on successful one. Being underwater doesn't grant resistance against this damage.
